header.title: About
header.subtitle: Ken Homestay
header.description: Traditional breath, modern living rhythm - Boutique Homestay in Da Nang

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: “Ken“ Homestay – like a cocoon gently embracing your soul, bringing a place of peace and tranquility amidst the hustle and bustle of everyday life. Here, you can immerse yourself in the simple, rustic rhythm of the locals, rediscover serenity and authentic experiences – feelings like coming “home“ in a new land. It is in these moments that your spirit, like butterfly wings after days of quiet metamorphosis, once again radiates with life.
story.paragraph2: Not only that, “Ken“ is also inspired by the journey of Da Nang itself – a city that was once part of Quang Nam province, has gone through many stages of formation and development to become one of Vietnam's iconic destinations today. Like a cocoon nurturing transformation before revealing a new life, Da Nang has also undergone its own “metamorphosis“, leaving an impression of resilience, innovation and vibrant development.

visionMission.title: Vision And Mission
visionMission.visionText: To become the leading Boutique Homestay brand in Da Nang, providing customers with sophisticated accommodation spaces combined with unique experience activities, imbued with local cultural identity and traditions.
visionMission.missionText: “Ken” is committed to providing customers with a cozy, comfortable space like “home”, where you can immerse yourself in the simple lifestyle of the locals. We constantly bring authentic and unique experiences, while contributing to preserving and spreading the distinctive cultural values of the Central region.

slogan.title: Our Slogan
slogan.description: Our slogan expresses the core philosophy of Ken Homestay - a place of intersection between traditional values and modern living. We value and preserve Vietnamese cultural identity, while providing modern amenities that meet the needs of travelers in the digital age.

values.title: Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide all our activities

value1.title: Honoring Vietnamese Identity
value1.description: Accommodation spaces and experience activities tell a unique story about regional culture and people. Rustic but sophisticated design, the harmony between modernity and traditional beauty.

value2.title: Customer-Centric
value2.description: Creating personalized experiences, bringing the most familiar and comfortable feeling to customers. Each traveler has their own story, and 'Ken' provides customized services to create a memorable stay experience.

value3.title: Environmentally Friendly Development
value3.description: Encouraging eco-friendly tourism and minimizing negative impacts on the environment. We are committed to operating sustainably, using local and environmentally friendly materials.

pageHeader.description: Discover Vietnamese culture through unique experiences

morningLifestyle.title: Vietnamese Morning Lifestyle
morningLifestyle.subtitle: Eat breakfast, drink Vietnamese tea, filter coffee
morningLifestyle.description: From 7:00 - 9:30 a.m every day, customers at the homestay will enjoy drinks that are indispensable in the daily lives of local people.

option1.title: Option 1:
option1.description: Homestay will prepare ingredients for customers to prepare their own breakfast (sandwiches, eggs, cereal, fresh milk, lettuce, tomatoes, jam...)

option2.title: Option 2:
option2.description: If the customer wants to eat local food, they will send dish information to the host the night before. The host will assist customers in ordering meals.

morningLifestyle.coffeeTeaDescription: The homestay arranges a simple Vietnamese coffee counter including: dry coffee, filter, sugar packets, condensed milk, ice and coffee making instructions. The small tea counter includes: 2 types of dry tea, tea pots, tea brewing instructions.

icedMilk.title: Iced milk coffee:
icedMilk.step1: Host supports installation phin into the cup, compress the coffee.
icedMilk.step2: Brew coffee for 1-2 minutes with 30ml of boiling water.
icedMilk.step3: Continue pouring 70-100 ml of boiling water into the filter and wait for 4-5 minutes.
icedMilk.step4: Add 2-3 spoons of condensed milk into the glass, stir well until combined, then add ice and enjoy (Customize according to customers' preferences).

icedBlack.title: Iced black coffee:
icedBlack.step1: Host supports installation phin into the cup, compressing the coffee.
icedBlack.step2: Brew coffee for 2-3 minutes with 30ml of boiling water.
icedBlack.step3: Pour about 70 ml of boiling water (almost full phin) enter phin wait for 4-5 minutes.
icedBlack.step4: Add 1 packet of sugar to the glass, stir well until combined, then add ice and enjoy (Customize according to customers' preferences).

tea.title: Vietnamese Tea
tea.description: 2 popular types of tea are drunk in the morning: green tea, long tea, and there are also seasonal teas.

instructions.title: Detailed instructions for visitors:
instructions.step1: Put about 2-3g of tea into a teapot or small cup (depending on your taste).
instructions.step2: Pour water into the tea, wait a few seconds and then pour it away, helping to remove dirt and making the tea softer.
instructions.step3: Pour boiling water into the teapot or cup, about 200ml (depending on the amount of tea). Do not pour water that is too boiling (avoid water above 98°C so as not to make the tea bitter).
instructions.step4: Let the tea steep for about 2-3 minutes (depending on the type of tea, green tea can be steeped for 1-2 minutes, black tea for 3-4 minutes). Tea steeping time will affect the strength and flavor of the tea.
instructions.step5: After the tea has steeped, you can pour it into individual glasses and enjoy.

cookingClass.title: Cooking Class
cookingClass.subtitle: Learn to Cook Vietnamese Cuisine
cookingClass.description: Experience the authentic flavors of Vietnamese cuisine by participating in our cooking class. We prepare fresh seasonal ingredients (vegetables from the market or Kén's garden, meat, fish, shrimp, squid...) from the local market that day.

step1.title: Check-in
step1.description: When customers arrive to check in, the host will introduce information about tomorrow's cooking class and ask if they want to participate. Detailed information about time, location, and price list will be provided.

step2.title: Market
step2.description: Go to the morning market around 9:00 AM (Vietnamese people's time to go to the market to buy fresh ingredients is from 5:00 - 9:00 AM). Guide and introduce tourists to visit local markets and buy fresh ingredients with local people.

step3.title: Cook
step3.description: The host will be the one conducting the cooking class with customers to make traditional Vietnamese dishes. Customers are encouraged to participate in every step of food preparation (from washing, preparing to seasoning) to increase the experience.

step4.title: Enjoy
step4.description: After completing cooking, everyone will enjoy the prepared dishes together, creating a comfortable and friendly space for customers to share their feelings.

noTechNight.title: No-Tech Night
noTechNight.description: Modern life often pulls us into phone screens, causing us to miss out on precious moments. "No-Tech Night" at "Kén" offers guests a chance to step away from the digital world and spend a meaningful evening reconnecting with themselves, nature, and those around them.
noTechNight.subtitle: Disconnect to Reconnect

feature1.title: A Wooden Box for Devices
feature1.description: "Kén" provides a beautifully crafted wooden box where guests can place their electronic devices, allowing them to take a break from technology.

feature2.title: Gentle Reminders
feature2.description: A charming note in the room reads: "Tonight, turn off your screens and turn on your emotions!"

activities.title: A Tech-Free Space – Diverse Activities for Everyone:

activity1.title: "Nhậu" Like a Local (BBQ)
activity1.description: For those who want to experience Vietnam's authentic drinking culture. Raise your glasses, enjoy fun drinking games, and share everyday stories (including meats & beer).

activity2.title: Play Board Games
activity2.description: From familiar games like Uno and "Horse Chess" (Cờ cá ngựa) to traditional Vietnamese games like Ô Ăn Quan, all are available for a fun and engaging night.

activity3.title: Read & Enjoy Your Own Space
activity3.description: For those who prefer a quiet evening, "Kén" offers a cozy reading corner with travel books, literature, and magazines.

activity4.title: Herbal Tea & Conversations
activity4.description: A warm pot of herbal tea is prepared, encouraging guests to sit together, chat, and share stories from their journeys.

value.title: The Value of Disconnection
value.benefit1: A truly relaxing night, free from notifications and messages
value.benefit2: A unique experience that blends the excitement of local drinking culture with a peaceful space to unwind
value.benefit3: Encouraging real human connections rather than screens
